title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5118 - Conduct And Operation Of Video Lottery Gaming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5118 - Conduct And Operation Of Video Lottery Gaming

State Regulations
§ 5118.1 - General definitions, qualifications, restrictions, validations and regulations applying to video lottery gaming
§ 5118.2 - Display of rules of play
§ 5118.3 - Credit redemption
§ 5118.4 - Validation of vouchers
§ 5118.5 - Discharge of State liability upon payment
§ 5118.6 - Testing and certification of video lottery gaming systems
§ 5118.7 - Maintenance, repair and servicing of video lottery terminals
§ 5118.8 - Inventory storage
§ 5118.9 - Hours of Operation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5118

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
